# Number of lines of code in new($$$): 10
sub new($$$) {
    my ($proto, $source, $params) = @_;
    my $class = ref($proto) || $proto;
    my $self = {
        source => $source,
        params => $params,
    };
    bless $self, $class;
    return $self;
}
